name: Cooking with Cain
description:
Cooking with Cain is a turn-based RPG in which players are given ingredients to craft attacks with. Three ingredients form an attack, and each ingredient adds damage and potentially an effect to the final attack. 

Credits:

  • Conan - Programming
  •  Kyle - Design, Programming, Writing 
  • Molina - Art, Programming, Producer
  • Theo - Programming 
  • Anthony - Art 
  • Ollie - Art
  •  Rami - Art 
  • Will - Art
  • Background art courtesy of https://zalarieunique.ru
